member.name: WINHTTP_CERTIFICATE_INFO
member.summary: The WINHTTP_CERTIFICATE_INFO structure contains certificate information returned from the server. This structure is used by the function.

member.name: WINHTTP_CERTIFICATE_INFO.ftExpiry
member.summary: A structure that contains the date the certificate expires.

member.name: WINHTTP_CERTIFICATE_INFO.ftStart
member.summary: A structure that contains the date the certificate becomes valid.

member.name: WINHTTP_CERTIFICATE_INFO.lpszSubjectInfo
member.summary: A pointer to a buffer that contains the name of the organization, site, and server for which the certificate was issued.

member.name: WINHTTP_CERTIFICATE_INFO.lpszIssuerInfo
member.summary: A pointer to a buffer that contains the name of the organization, site, and server that issued the certificate.

member.name: WINHTTP_CERTIFICATE_INFO.lpszProtocolName
member.summary: A pointer to a buffer that contains the name of the protocol used to provide the secure connection. This member is not current used.

member.name: WINHTTP_CERTIFICATE_INFO.lpszSignatureAlgName
member.summary: A pointer to a buffer that contains the name of the algorithm used to sign the certificate. This member is not current used.

member.name: WINHTTP_CERTIFICATE_INFO.lpszEncryptionAlgName
member.summary: A pointer to a buffer that contains the name of the algorithm used to perform encryption over the secure channel (SSL/TLS) connection. This member is not current used.

member.name: WINHTTP_CERTIFICATE_INFO.dwKeySize
member.summary: The size, in bytes, of the key.
